column1: dc:description: ["The UK dataset of prisoners who were transported to New South Wales
column3: was collected by Deborah Oxley and her colleagues and analysed in order to answer several questions
column4: including a study on the effects of smallpox. The dataset needs to be carefully studied in terms of potential selectivity
column5: as Oxley (2006) did. The level of regional disaggregation include the larger geographic units of Ireland
column7: as well as rural and urban England. The coverage of the data is from the 1750s to the 1820s."]

column1: "dc:description": "measure in which the height was originally taken"

"dc:description": "type of sample used for constructing the database"
